mapper.select: select t2.date_str as x,if(t3.c is null,0,t3.c) as y from( select @sdate:=date_add(@sdate,interval 1 day) as date_str from( select @sdate:=date_add(date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day) from mysql.time_zone limit 999) t1) t2 left join (select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date_str,count(1) as c from tienchin_business group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) t3 on t2.date_str=t3.date_str where date(@sdate) <= date_add(date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day)

set @cnum:=0; select t4.x,(@cnum:=@cnum+t4.y) as y from( select t2.date_str as x,if(t3.c is null,0,t3.c) as y from( select @sdate:=date_add(@sdate,interval 1 day) as date_str from( select @sdate:=date_add(date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day) from mysql.time_zone limit 999) t1) t2 left join (select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as date_str,count(1) as c from tienchin_business group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) t3 on t2.date_str=t3.date_str where date(@sdate) <= date_add(date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval -1 day)) t4;
